text: Jauharabad railway station () is located in Khushab District, Punjab Pakistan Jauharabad Railway is a small junction in Sargodha division ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Punjab, Pakistan Category:Railway stations on Sangla Hill–Kundian Branch Line
title: Jauharabad railway station
